name: geographicCoverage
displayName: Information on the geographic coverage of the data. Includes the total geographic scope of the data.

name: country
displayName: The country or nation that the Dataset is about.

name: state
displayName: The state or province that the Dataset is about. Use GeoNames for correct spelling and avoid abbreviations.

name: city
displayName: The name of the city that the Dataset is about. Use GeoNames for correct spelling and avoid abbreviations.

name: otherGeographicCoverage
displayName: Other information on the geographic coverage of the data.

name: geographicUnit
displayName: Lowest level of geographic aggregation covered by the Dataset, e.g., village, county, region.

name: geographicBoundingBox
displayName: The fundamental geometric description for any Dataset that models geography is the geographic bounding box. It describes the minimum box, defined by west and east longitudes and north and south latitudes, which includes the largest geographic extent of the  Dataset's geographic coverage. This element is used in the first pass of a coordinate-based search. Inclusion of this element in the codebook is recommended, but is required if the bound polygon box is included.

name: westLongitude
displayName: Westernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -180,0 <= West  Bounding Longitude Value <= 180,0.

name: eastLongitude
displayName: Easternmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -180,0 <= East Bounding Longitude Value <= 180,0.

name: northLongitude
displayName: Northernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -90,0 <= North Bounding Latitude Value <= 90,0.

name: southLongitude
displayName: Southernmost coordinate delimiting the geographic extent of the Dataset. A valid range of values,  expressed in decimal degrees, is -90,0 <= South Bounding Latitude Value <= 90,0.

name: country
dataverseAlias: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

name: country
dataverseAlias: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

name: country
dataverseAlias: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)
